author: ssekmen
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #28593 . Description from the original PR from @fabiocos :

"The PR #28201 has added a new GenFilter module, introducing anyway a problem in the IB CMSSW_11_1_X_2019-12-09-2300 as the module was erroneously places in the src directory, while now all the modules have been moved into the plugins directory.

I have taken the opportunity to turn the module into global as suggested by @makortel and fix a few coding style issues violating our rules."

#### PR validation:

standard tests

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of #28593
title: Fixes for the pMSSMFilter - backport of #28593 to 106X
